title: Liverpool transfer news and rumours: Marcelo Brozovic linked
description: All the latest Liverpool transfer news and rumours from across the British and European press on Friday, January 19.
content: Liverpool have joined Tottenham in the race to sign Inter Milan midfielder Marcelo Brozovic, according to Corriere dello Sport.The Croatia international has made just seven starts for Inter so far this term and Jurgen Klopp is believed to be an admirer of the player.Meanwhile, the Reds have rejected an offer from Sevilla to take Daniel Sturridge on loan for the remainder of the campaign, says the Daily Mail.The injury-plagued striker is desperate for regular playing time between now and the end of the season in order to be on the plane with England for this summer's World Cup.Bolton, Wigan, Bradford and Oxford are chasing the Liverpool defender Lloyd Jones, according to reports.The 22-year-old joined Liverpool from Plymouth Argyle for Â£150,000 seven years ago but has struggled to force his way into the first-team picture.
